mapper.select: SELECT qp.qm_permission_pid FROM qm_permission qp INNER JOIN position_permission_re ppr ON qp.qm_permission_id = ppr.qm_permission_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.position_id = ppr.position_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT qp.qm_permission_pid FROM qm_permission qp INNER JOIN user_qm_permission_re uqpr ON uqpr.qm_permission_id = qp.qm_permission_id INNER JOIN user u ON uqpr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
